name: Meganeura
description:
First person game for coursera Game Design and Development course.It would be better if you download it - it's work slower in browser.

All instructions in game.

Main goal is reach portal in second level.

You can find here such features as: 

  • Parkour!!! Jump on cliffs, from cliffs and up cliffs;
  •  Particle base weapon - lightning;
  • Physics base weapon - axe;
  • In game generated animation.

That's all i could do in 4 weeks.

Used assets:

https://opengameart.org/content/rockbreaking

https://opengameart.org/content/loopable-dungeon-ambience
